name: Hocus
description:
Worked on a team of 4 to design and prototype a camera app for Android at HackMIT 2013. The app takes advantage of AirTouch technology to allow users to focus their images by hovering their finger over the area of the image that should be focused. This makes it much easier to produce clear, steady images (especially when producing video) because the touchless interaction allows you to refocus the image without causing camera to shake.

Won a prize for Most Innovative Use of Hover.
